data: On the muddy verge of a shallow little pool the man lay prone and still, as still as those poor dead whose broken bodies rested all about him, where they had fallen, months or days, hours or weeks ago, in those grim contests which the quick were wont insensately to wage for a few charnel yards of that debatable ground.
muddy verge of a shallow little pool
months or days, hours or weeks ago
The False Faces: Further Adventures from the History of the Lone Wolf
